title-block-banner: true

# Preface {.unnumbered}

This online book covers the tutorial on digital soil mapping from the course Applied Geodata Science 2 at the University of Bern. Code and data was provided by [Madlene Nussbaum](https://www.bfh.ch/de/ueber-die-bfh/personen/3ipudkkxwe7z/) and the conversion into an online tutorial was done by Pascal Schneider.

# System Setup

If you want to replicate the code of this tutorial, we suggest to either load the latest `renv.lock` file from this tutorial's repository and load it using the {renv} package. Alternatively, the output below could be used to traceback and install the exact package versions that were used in this tutorial.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
sessionInfo()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
